trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were 2 other sightings in Houston on or around August 27th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi was going outside to feed the cats since i couldn't sleep and as i was turning to go back into the house, i noticed in the northern part of the sky a very brilliant light coming from a semi-oval object which seemed to have a somewhat large diameter. this object was moving extremely fast, when it 1st appeared it started upward and then moved downward and then after about 6 seconds, it disappeared as quickly as it appeared. the sky is pretty overcast this morning, revealing no stars. i've seen a comet before, shooting stars (many) and a meteor shower...i'm a student working towards my md\phd and consider myself as someone who thinks "scientifically" but i have to say, that i have never seen anything like this object before and after i came back into the house, i feel quite uneasy. i'd much rather not have seen it. i'd be seriously surprised if no one else has seen this object... but then again, how many people are up and outside at exactly 3:04am?
